title: 4th Annual Beauty at the Bay Event for the "I'm Every Woman of 2016"
desc: Oh YES!? You are Every Woman!? You work hard,? you organize the family and so much more!?? You can only please one person at a time and this day, choose YOU!?  At Beauty at the Bay, you get to experience a day of Beauty under one roof with amazing Inspiration by our women lineup of talent.This Event is Exclusively Made for Women! When it comes down to it, we feel women should be rewarded for their accomplishments!? We need to take time out to be nurtured, spend quality time with our girlfriends and indulge in some discount shopping too! The Annual Beauty at the Bay event is produced because we feel women do not take out enough time for themselves and in a sense, have to be conjured into doing it!? For this reason, Beauty at the Bay is here! At this event, we will SALUTE ladies who have accomplished many things such as  ? See you? May 21, 2016! ? ? ? ? ??  In the , the ladies get the chance to receive pampering with makeup makeovers, massages, hair therapy and retail therapy. We enjoy our vendors as they are some of the most amazing people you want to meet! If you would like to be a vendor, please download form by clicking? follow instructions!
